item.description: This is the first part of GCP’s serie. In this article, you will familiar with somes of basic terminilogy used in Google Cloud Platform (GCP). item.title: Test connectivity between host project and service project
item.author: thqnhat@outlook.com (Nhat Tong)
item.description: Create a Google Workspace (G Suite) In Google Cloud Platform (GCP), you can design your network using host project and service project model. This model is centralize. It allow you to maintain your network easier. A host project is a project which contains your Shared-VPC and it’s subnets. A service project is a project which contains the vm instances which use the subnet created in your shared VPC. Here is the model: In this article, I will show you how to implement it.
